name: SpacePool
description:
Hey Guys!

In this game you play a round of poolbilliard, against a friend. But it has a little twist, because you play it with planets, which are effected by the gravity of bigger planets.

I hope you have fun with it and I would love to hear some feedback.

Sadly I haven't had the time to add soundeffects, or polish any of the art.

And best luck for your submissions to the BTP-gameJam!
